[00:00.00]The Feels - TWICE (트와이스)
[00:00.02]Lyrics by：Woo Min Lee “collapsedone”/Justin Reinstein/Anna Timgren/Boy Matthews

[00:00.19]Original publisher：JYP Publishing (KOMCA), NuVibe Music, James Norton Pub Designee (PRS)
[00:00.26]Sub-publisher：JYP Publishing (KOMCA), Music Cube, Inc., Warner Chappell Music Korea Inc.
[00:00.34]Sessions Programming by：Woo Min Lee "collapsedone"/Justin Reinstein
[00:00.39]Synth by：Woo Min Lee "collapsedone"/Justin Reinstein
[00:00.44]Guitar by：Woo Min Lee "collapsedone"
[00:00.47]Bass by：Woo Min Lee "collapsedone"
[00:00.51]Background vocals by：Sophia Pae/Anna Timgren
[00:00.55]Vocals directed by：Woo Min Lee "collapsedone", Sophia Pae
[00:00.60]Vocal edits by：Woo Min Lee "collapsedone"
[00:00.64]Recorded by：Eom Sehee, Lee Sangyeop at JYPE Studios
[00:00.69]Mixed by：Tony Maserati at Mirrorball Studios, North Hollywood
[00:00.74]Assistant mix engineer：David K Younghyun
[00:00.78]Mastered by：Kwon Namwoo at 821 Sound Mastering
[00:00.83]Immersive Mix Engineer：John Hanes at MixStar Studios, Virginia Beach, VA
